answerText: William Dean Howells[10] The Rise of Silas Lapham mocked the rags-to-riches stories of this author, who published Ragged Dick and wrote almost exclusively in the genre.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 12 | 5 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In a children's story written by this author, a girl's wish that it should be "Christmas Every Day" is granted for an entire year. For 10 points each: [10] Name this author who told the story of a paint magnate in The Rise of Silas Lapham.
